attributes.action: Referendum on the UK leaving the EU
attributes.additional_details: I request a referendum to be put to the people of the united kingdom on the withdrawal of membership of the EU formally known as the EEC. I am invoking article 50 of the Lisbon treaty. I want our country to have free trade under EFTA and not have the blood sucked out of us by the EU.

rejection.details:
Please see the petition below:

Petition Title: England To Leave The UK Referendum

Created by: Jon Mitchell

Closing: 30/03/2015
